amendment.description: Amendment sought to add $3,902,000 to the aquatic habitat and species conservation fund which would allow Federal agencies to work with the State and local agencies to attack aquatic plants which overrun the delta at the confluence of the Sacramento and San Joaquin rivers.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the Bureau of Land Management by 4,010,000 million and increase the US Fish and Wildlife Service by 3,902,000 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 244 (Roll no. 393).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 244 (Roll no. 393).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Garamendi.
